body_html:
Heyy I am applying for RGSoC2017 and I wanted to get a feel of the project, so I have been solving a few issues :) This seems to be an interesting one. I wanted to use the data-confirm-modal gem to resolve this. Should I go ahead with it?
@carpodaster

body:
Heyy I am applying for RGSoC2017 and I wanted to get a feel of the project, so I have been solving a few issues :) This seems to be an interesting one.  I wanted to use the [data-confirm-modal gem](https://github.com/ifad/data-confirm-modal) to resolve this. Should I go ahead with it?
@carpodaster
